About Me

My name is Ashley and I am a current student at the University of Maine, studying computer science. I have a strong interest in Data Science, Machine Learning, and Software Engineering.
View Resume

My Experience

University of Maine

Collaborated with a research team to understand retention rate of Computer Science students. Wrote programs to analyze and visualize collected data.

My Projects

Philly Crash Data

Public Philadelphia traffic incident records were used to create this visualization.

CS Retention Project

Cleaned and sorted collected data on Computer Science majors at the University of Maine. Data was then analyzed and turned into visualizations to better understand where student retention would drop. (Repo is currently private while under development.)

Star Dasher

This 2D side-scrolling game is created with Pygame and Photoshop.

PG Bot

A Discord bot created in collaboration with and for a small programming Discord server. Features include a Pomodoro timer, timezone logging, coding leaderboard, file storage and more. Currently still in development.
